project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of the construction of an ammonia plant at Araucaria, Parana, with a manufacturing capacity of about 1,200 metric tons per day, including an air separation plant and facilities to store about 5,000 metric tons of ammonia; an adjacent plant to manufacture urea, with a capacity of about 1,500 metric tons per day, including facilities to store about 30,000 metric tons of bulk and bagged urea; a sulfur recovery unit with a capacity of about 58 metric tons per day; and related ancillary facilities. The project also includes construction and equipment of the necessary laboratories, offices and maintenance shops.
